pubspec.name: just_audio
pubspec.description: A feature-rich audio player for Flutter. Loop, clip and concatenate any sound from any source (asset/file/URL/stream) in a variety of audio formats with gapless playback.

pubspec.name: just_audio
pubspec.description: Flutter plugin to play audio from streams, files and assets. Works with audio_service to play audio in the background.
pubspec.author: Ryan Heise <ryan@ryanheise.com>

pubspec.name: just_audio
pubspec.description: Audio player for files, assets, URLs and DASH/HLS/custom streams supporting gapless looping, shuffling, concatenating and clipping of audio. Works with audio_service to play audio in the background.
